title: Mark van Bronkhorst
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Mark van Bronkhorst**

Mark van Bronkhorst is principle of [MvB Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MvB%20Design), [MvB Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MvB%20Fonts) and [TypoBrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypoBrand). Through his firm, MvB Design, he has served clients [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) and [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus) among others.

Mark art directed the first three issues of _[font magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font_Magazine)_.

Mark has had great success with the commercial release of the quirky, DIN-like typeface ITC Conduit. His more recent [garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20140203235510/http:/typophile.com/wiki/garamond) style font, Verdigris, is also well liked.
author: filip blazek
